The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 27 July is 55,452 (6,418.2 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 22 July, there were 3,562 new confirmed cases (412.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 15 July, there were 3,615 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 1% (53 fewer cases).
